About Me

Hi, I'm Yejin Park but please call me Cathy!

I'm a UI/UX Designer based in Seoul, South Korea. I graduated from the School of Information at the University of Michigan with a special focus on UI/UX Design and a minor in Applied Statistics. I'm very passionate about social media and how it influences the people, thus I hope I can go further with my studies in incorporating media in order to impact people. I also enjoy watching movies and video-editing. While I travel, I always try to create a video at the end of each trip to remember the moments.

P.S. That's my dog Oreo!
